name: プレシャスLOVE
summary: End of November. Ogata Kosuke is a third year high school student who has been studying hard to get employment. From a trivial quarrel with his sister he makes a bet that he finds a girlfriend before the holy Christmas night.
info:
• 开发: BLACK PACKAGE
  • 原画: 大越秀武
  • 发行日期: 1998/12/24
  • 剧本: きさらぎせいあ
